## Purchases.isEntitledTo() method

Convenience method to check whether a user is entitled to a specific entitlement. This will use [Purchases.getCustomerInfo()](./purchases-js.purchases.getcustomerinfo.md) under the hood.

**Signature:**

```typescript
isEntitledTo(entitlementIdentifier: string): Promise<boolean>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  entitlementIdentifier | string | The entitlement identifier you want to check. |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;boolean&gt;

Whether the user is entitled to the specified entitlement

## Exceptions

[PurchasesError](./purchases-js.purchaseserror.md) if there is an error while fetching the customer info.
